channel.title: iceland on Jacob Proffer
channel.description: Recent content in iceland on Jacob Proffer

item.title: Iceland Blog 07
item.description: After a quick breakfast at Reykjavik Lights on Monday morning, Myles and I checked out of the hotel.

item.title: Iceland Blog 06
item.description: Myles and I did not have a lot planned for the final day in Iceland.

item.title: Iceland Blog 05
item.description: First and foremost, I should mention that I travel light. For the past year of travel, even to Japan, I’ve packed one pair of pants to cut down on space in my backpack.

item.title: Iceland Blog 04
item.description: The drive to Skaftafell, a wilderness area inside of Vatnaj√∂kull National Park, took over four hours.

item.title: Iceland Blog 03
item.description: There were still plenty of sites to see in Iceland, far too many. Thursday was dedicated to locations that Myles and I wanted to see towards the north east of Reykjavik.

item.title: Iceland Blog 02
item.description: Wednesday was the most well-thought out and detailed day of the trip. It started with breakfast at the hotel at around seven thirty, with the goal to leave the hotel by eight.

item.title: Iceland Blog 01
item.description: The Boeing 757 touched down in Iceland around six thirty in the morning on Tuesday, May 15th.

item.title: Iceland Blog 00
item.description: This is it. Tomorrow morning, I embark on a trip to Iceland with my best friend and co-worker, Myles Kedrowski.
